alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 2:19PM PDT until March 30 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet. Up to 12 inches on the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains, Southern Ventura County Mountains and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains
